mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,zuoye.laoshi_id as zuoyeLaoshiId ,zuoye.zuoye_uuid_number as zuoyeUuidNumber ,zuoye.zuoye_name as zuoyeName ,zuoye.zuoye_types as zuoyeTypes ,zuoye.zuoye_file as zuoyeFile ,zuoye.zuoye_content as zuoyeContent
FROM huida a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id left JOIN zuoye zuoye ON a.zuoye_id = zuoye.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.zuoye_id = #{params.zuoyeId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.huida_defen >= #{params.huidaDefenStart}
and a.huida_defen <= #{params.huidaDefenEnd}
and a.huida_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.huidaContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.clazz_id = #{params.clazzId}
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and a.zuoye_id IS NOT NULL
and zuoye.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId}
and zuoye.clazz_id = #{params.clazzId}
and zuoye.zuoye_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeUuidNumber},'%')
and zuoye.zuoye_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeName},'%')
and zuoye.zuoye_types = #{params.zuoyeTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(zuoye.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(zuoye.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and zuoye.zuoye_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
